thread.title: Openly gay boxer Yusaf Mack fights homophobe
thread.title_full: Openly gay boxer Yusaf Mack fights homophobe

title: Openly gay boxer Yusaf Mack fights homophobe
text: show ad Shocking moment openly gay boxer Yusaf Mack confronts man making homophobic comments and beats him bloody in the middle of a barber shop Yusaf Mack beat Hector Echevarria after the man repeatedly made homophobic comments about the openly gay boxer online Mack confronted Hector at the L A Clippers barber shop in Philadelphia on Saturday night, hitting him first while his head was in a sink He then pummeled Hector with punches until he was cowering on the ground and his face bloody Some close to Hector are saying online that he broke his ankle in the fight, but that has not been confirmed Hector made his social media accounts private, but did write after the fight he would rather have that on film than getting a 'd*** up my a**' Mack was a newly engaged father of ten when he came out as gay in 2015 after being spotted in an same-sex adult film Published: 01:40 GMT, 21 February 2017 | Updated: 07:47 GMT, 21 February 2017 23 shares
